sentences.sContent: Of particular note is the deviation threshold parameter and the dimensional shift parameters.
sentences.sContent_eng: Of particular note is the deviation threshold parameter and the dimensional shift parameters.
sentences.sCn: 需要特别注意的是偏差阈值参数和空间移位参数。

sentences.sContent: The formula on definite proportion exists not only in plane figure but also in three-dimensional figure.
sentences.sContent_eng: The formula on definite proportion exists not only in plane figure but also in three-dimensional figure.
sentences.sCn: 平面图形中有定比分点公式，在空间图形中也存在同样的定比分点公式。

sentences.sContent: If the dimensional shift in either direction is greater than our previously set threshold, increment the total deviation by the amount moved in both directions.
sentences.sContent_eng: If the dimensional shift in either direction is greater than our previously set threshold, increment the total deviation by the amount moved in both directions.
sentences.sCn: 如果在任意方向上的空间移位大于我们先前设定的阈值，就按照两个方向上移动的量增加总偏差。

phrases.pCn: adj. 二维的，平面的；二元的
一维艺术；单维的；单向度
三维结构；立体构成；智力三维结构模型
